page.title: 13Home Life in Guisborough II
page.content: Philip Summers,aged 10,also in the 3rd year at Belmont Junior School,writes: On Saturday I get up at 7.30,have breakfast & watch TV.At 10.30 I go horse-riding at Eston & come home at 1.I always go to Mark's house,make dens,play on bikes,& play football in the park. I also play a lot on my computer & my favourite game is Air- wolf.We go to our grandmas & there we play on the soil base over the fence from her house. Also we play football using the full-size goals on the field For dinner at grandmas we always have meat, mint jelly, peas,Yorkshire pud,etc. On Sundays we go to our Nannas & then take the dog for a walk on the fields.In the evening I watch football & Dallas,etc. In bed I go to sleep quickly but I always wake up about 1,switch my light on & read for an hour or so.
